name: Sule Ögüdücü
content: Dr. Sule Gunduz Oguducu Dr. Şule Gündüz Öğüdücü Professor Data Mining and Machine Learning Research Group Faculty of Computer and Informatics Istanbul Technical University , Maslak, Istanbul, Turkey Research Web Mining, Data Mining Publications Recent Publications Teaching BLG361 - Veritabanı Yönetim Sistemleri BLG351 - Mikrobilgisayar Laboratuvarı BLG212 - Mikroişlemci Sistemleri  BLG112E -  Discrete MathematicsBLG607 - Veri Madenciliği BLG614E - Web Mining Activities PC Chair, The 23rd International Symposium on Computer and Information Sciences (ISCIS'08), Istanbul, Turkey, October 2008. PC Member, The 22st International Symposium on Computer and Information Sciences (ISCIS'07), Ankara, Turkey, November 2007. PC Chair, Workshop on Data Mining and Business Intelligence, (DMBI 2007), Istanbul, Turkey, April 2007. PC Member, First International Workshop on Database Management and Application over Networks, (DBMAN 2007), Hong Kong, June 2007. PC Member, The 21st International Symposium on Computer and Information Sciences (ISCIS'06), Istanbul, Turkey, November 2006. PC Member, 1st International Workshop on XML, Web, and Internet Contents Technologies, (XWICT 2006), Hong Kong, June 2006. Research Projects San-tez project: Veri Madenciliği Çözümleri ile Satış Dağıtımı Öngörü Sistemi, 2013-2015ITU Graduate Thesis Support Fund: Determining Overlapping Communities in Dynamic Social Networks, 2012-2014.TURP : Tag User Resource Recommendation Project (Tubitak-110E027) TR-Web: A Faster and More Correct Recommendation System (Tubitak-105E162) Graduation Projects Schedule Calendar Contact email: sgunduz AT itu DOT edu DOT tr phone: +90 212 285 3597 fax: +90 212 285 3679 location: ITU Department of Computer Engineering, Turkey office: EEB 3305 top
